#summary textField(objectName,property[label,wrapLabel,prepend,append,prependToLabel,appendToLabel, errorElement])
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ViewHelperFunctions View Helper Functions]

*Description*

Builds and returns a string containing a text field form control based on the supplied `objectName` and `property`.

*Return Type*:

String

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *objectName* || string || true ||  || The variable name of the object to build the form control for ||
|| *property* || string || true || || The name of the property (database column) to use in the form control ||
|| *label* || string || false || || The label text to use in the form control ||
|| *wrapLabel* || boolean || false || true || Whether or not to wrap the label around the form control ||
|| *prepend* || string || false || || String to prepend to the form control. Useful to wrap the form control around HTML tags ||
|| *append* || string || false || || String to append to the form control. Useful to wrap the form control around HTML tags ||
|| *prependToLabel* || string || false || || String to prepend to the form control's label. Useful to wrap the form control around HTML tags ||
|| *appendToLabel* || string || false || || String to append to the form control's label. Useful to wrap the form control around HTML tags ||
|| *errorElement* || string || false || div || HTML tag to wrap the form control with when the object contains errors ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<!--- view code --->
<cfoutput>
  <p>#textField(objectName="user", property="firstName")#</p>
</cfoutput>
}}}
